justification: “Before and after the EMA, we assessed negative and positive mental health using the Brief Symptom Inventory (BSI; Derogatis & Melisaratos, 1983).”
The authors state they assessed “negative and positive mental health using … the Positive Mental Health Scale (PMH; Lukat et al., 2016).”

measured_by: Mini-DIPS (Brief Version of the Diagnostic Interview for Mental Disorders)
justification: Exclusion criteria were evaluated “as determined with the Brief Version of the Diagnostic Interview for Mental Disorders (Mini-DIPS; Margraf et al., 2017).”
During the second session participants completed the “Young Schema Questionnaire -Short Form 3 (YSQ-SF3; Kriston et al., 2013).”

topic_or_construct: Elements of functional analysis (situations, responses, consequences)
measured_by: POINT-Assessment personalized EMA item set / FA questionnaire
justification: The researchers “put together 119 situations, 12 emotional responses, 80 cognitive responses, 46 physiological responses, and 62 behavioral responses to assess elements of FA in a questionnaire,” later selecting 25-35 of these items for individualized EMA.
